
# Tables

```{r MeasurementTable, tab.cap = "", eval = FALSE}
MEASUREMENTS_TABLE = data.table(read.xlsx("../inputs/data/Table_Measurements.xlsx"))

MEASUREMENTS_TABLE_FT = 
  MEASUREMENTS_TABLE %>% 
  flextable() %>%
  compose(i = 2, j = "Notation", value = as_paragraph("L", as_sub("F"))) %>%
  compose(i = 3, j = "Notation", value = as_paragraph("L", as_sub("T"))) %>%
  compose(i = 4, j = "Notation", value = as_paragraph("L", as_sub("D"))) %>%
  compose(i = 5, j = "Notation", value = as_paragraph("W", as_sub("T"))) %>%
  width(width = c(0.8, 2.4, 10, 0.5, 0.8))

MEASUREMENTS_TABLE_FT
```
